game.name: Slave's Sword
game.shortDescription: Slave's Sword is the story of Luna, a former aristocratic knight of the Empire. Now living peacefully as a mercenary, she quickly becomes involved in a scandal that results in her enslavement. Can Luna recapture her freedom and escape from her predicament?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Slave's Sword is the story of Luna, a former aristocratic knight of the Empire. Now living peacefully as a mercenary, she quickly becomes involved in a scandal that results in her enslavement. Can Luna recapture her freedom and escape from her predicament?

reviewHighlights.text: The story isn't bad, some of the scenes aren't bad either, the upgrade system is pretty small, the card thing is interesting, but you can only use one...
